title: The Bachelorette intruder Ryan Anderson reveals heart surgery scars
text:
The Bachelorette's latest intruder Ryan Anderson has revealed he suffers from a heart condition that requires ongoing surgery.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday, the 32-year-old says he has extensive chest scarring from operations due to his Tetralogy of Fallot - a heart valve defect.

The rescue dog advocate told the paper: 'It is a conversation starter!' but admits he was once embarrassed by his scars.

'It is a conversation starter!' On Tuesday, Bachelorette intruder Ryan Anderson (pictured) told The Daily Telegraph he was once 'self conscious' about his chest scars from heart surgery

He said: 'When I was younger I was self-conscious about it but now I own it. I usually tell people I got it from a lawn bowls accident to try and break the ice'.

Ryan added that it's a 'serious condition' and he will need more surgery every 10 to 15 years.

But he says he is 'fighting fit' and suffers from no health issues as a result of his condition.

It comes after it was revealed that Ryan, who enters the mansion as an intruder this week, already knows Bachelorette Angie Kent from the outside world.

Speaking to TV Week, Ryan revealed he previously crossed paths with Angie, and couldn't pass on the opportunity to compete for her heart on the show.

'It started as a common interest in the rescue-dog scene,' Ryan said, referring to their their early encounter banter on social media.

Matey! It comes after it was revealed that Ryan, who enters the mansion as an intruder this week, already knows Bachelorette Angie Kent (left) from the outside world

'If you have a look at one of her (Kent's) Instagram posts I jokingly said 'where do I sign up?'' he previously told Perth Now.

The hunk, who is an assistance-dog charity ambassador said he wanted to ask Angie to be his date to a gala ball, before she revealed she was the Bachelorette.

While the news may have ruined his immediate plans, Ryan said he started thinking about whether he could actually appear as a contestant on the show himself.

'I let it be at first... but then I thought, 'I'm going to get that date regardless' and subsequently applied for the show,' he told TV Week.
description: The Bachelorette's latest intruder Ryan Anderson has revealed he suffers from a heart condition that requires ongoing surgery.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
